goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

Class OptionMap<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans.OptionMap<T,A,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - The type of term associated with the KRT that is used with the transition classes and actions that constitute this map.
    A - - The type of atom associated with the KRT that is used with the transition classes and actions that constitute this map.
    U - - The type of update associated with the KRT that is used with the transition classes and actions that constitute this map.

    public class OptionMap<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a mapping from transition classes (i.e. action rule) to the action options that they generate in a specific mental state. Checking whether these actually are options is not done in this class; it is assumed that they simply are.
    Author:
    sungshik
